email_response.subject: Re: OPPORTUNITY: Satellite Upgrade technicians needed in Chicago
email_response.body:
Hello,

Thanks for the opportunity!

I have a bucket truck (2020 International with 40ft aerial lift) and various cable testing equipment. I also have a 28ft extension ladder.

I should mention that I don't currently own a spectrum analyzer. Most of my work has been cable installation rather than satellite, so I haven't needed one. Is it possible to rent one for this project, or would the client provide the equipment?

I'm willing to travel in the Chicago area. I have current insurance that I can provide if needed.

Let me know if we can work something out.

James Wilson
Midwest Networking
(847) 555-0567
